page.title: 15Wethersfield Village.
page.content: We went to look at Wethersfield village as it was in our area as well. It looked about the same size as our villlage of Finchingfield.Another thing that was the same was that all the older houses are in the very centre of the village and all the newer houses are around the outside. Both villages are set in the middle of arable farmland.Most of the people who live in them work outside of the villages apart from people like shopkeepers etc.Quite a few even commute to London,though most work in the surrounding towns and a small number work in Wethersfield Air Base. Wethersfield has a pretty village green at its centre with some large Lime trees on it. Most of the village is situated wthin a hundred metres of the centre.
